title: Girls Who Code - Python Game Development
short_description: Developed 5 original Python games with inclusive character customization, downloaded 200+ times
full_description: Developed 5 original Python games from scratch featuring inclusive character customization. Downloaded 200+ times. Created open source repository to allow 50+ developers to use original code. Explored game design, cybersecurity, data science, web development, and code-generation AI through these projects.
highlights: Explored cybersecurity, data science, web dev, AI
